sentences.english: A heavy shower drench the camp ers.
sentences.chinese: 一阵骤雨把露营者都淋湿了。

sentences.english: Ants climb the wall, before the big rain.
sentences.chinese: 蚂蚁成群爬上墙，雨水淋湿大屋梁。

sentences.english: I was the only umbrella, still wet of the people?
sentences.chinese: 我是独一有伞，依然淋湿的人吗？

sentences.english: On his way it suddenly rained, and he got wet all over.
sentences.chinese: 路上，天忽然下雨，杨布全身淋湿了。

sentences.english: During the fire puja and smoke puja there were no rain, so no one got wet.
sentences.chinese: 在火供及烟供期间没有雨，所以没有人淋湿。

sentences.english: Golden sunset shed, who wet the heart.
sentences.chinese: 金色的夕阳洒下，淋湿了谁的心。

sentences.english: In the aftermath, the area was drenched in water with clothes and shoes piled on the bridge.
sentences.chinese: 在此之后，该地区是衣服和鞋上的桥桩水淋湿了。

sentences.english: Sometimes the weather isn’t great — but truthfully, I enjoy getting soaked in the rain.
sentences.chinese: 有时天气不好，但是说实话，我很喜欢在雨中淋湿。

sentences.english: If get wet, well maybe we just needed washing.
sentences.chinese: 如果淋湿了，那也许是因为我们的确需要冲洗一下了。

sentences.english: But the twigs stirred and plentifully showered dew that made me wet.
sentences.chinese: 但这嫩枝摇晃著，丰沛地洒下了露水，淋湿了我全身。

sentences.english: My tears into rain, you also won't get wet.
sentences.chinese: 我的泪变成雨，也舍不得淋湿你。

sentences.english: The rain drenched not only my clothes but my spirits.
sentences.chinese: 大雨不但淋湿了我的衣服，也打湿了我的心。

sentences.english: The thought of being rained upon was refreshing.
sentences.chinese: 想到被雨水淋湿也使我凉快不少。

sentences.english: They are wet with the showers of the mountains, and embrace the rock for want of a shelter.
sentences.chinese: 在山上被大雨淋湿，因没有避身之处就挨近磐石。

sentences.english: Luckily , we brought our umbrellas and raincoats , so we didn't get wet.
sentences.chinese: 幸运地是我们带了雨伞和雨衣，因此我们没淋湿。

definition: to get wet in the rain
to moisten/to dampen/to be steeped in/to be imbued with
a person who looks drenched and bedraggled/like a drowned rat/deep distress
Yushui or Rain Water, 2nd of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 19th February-5th March
to take shelter from the rain
